1200 fishers angling for 90 Mile Beach Snapper Bonanza’s $30k top prize https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/1200-fishers-angling-for-90-mile-beach-snapper-bonanzas-30k-top-prize/NFXTHTHJB5H67LPBZKCURLMNME/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/1200-fishers-angling-for-90-mile-beach-snapper-bonanzas-30k-top-prize/NFXTHTHJB5H67LPBZKCURLMNME/ Mike Dinsdale$200k of prizes up for grabs at annual 90 Mile Beach event in March. Mon, 24 Feb 2025 17:00:01 +0000 Far North fisher Zane Kaaka (centre), with Snapper Bonanza organisers Dave Collard and John Stewart, won the $30,000 top prize for the heaviest fish last year. About 1200 fishers will be back on Te-Oneroa-a-Tōhē 90 Mile Beach next month for this year’s competition.
